our-team.title: Our Team
our-team.description: Meet the team that makes it all happen.

members.name: Olivier
members.bio: Started coding since 13 years old in back-end development, then moved to front-end with Angular + Typescript. He is now a full-stack developer. Responsible for designing and developing the company's virtual products.

members.name: David
members.bio: Meet David, our developer and 3d modeller. With 5+ years of experience, David is a pro at both 3d modelling and programming using Java, html, CSS and JavaScript. He brings creativity and technical skills together to make our projects visually appealing and user-friendly.

members.name: Simon
members.bio: Meet Simon the Manager who has brought the team closer to manage events, overview the investments and overlook the marketing aspect of our current projects and future ambitions into launching Tokens and NFTS.
